entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saturna Island 12:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: NNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
